replies.body: So you kill him and then send him home with a new coat, fair enough.

They really didn't kill him that hard. They even gave some range back on Riftwalk while reducing the cost, making it 800 mana at max AND with 40% CDR with rank three rift walk, the cooldown is a ridiculous 1.2 seconds. I think people are over-reacting to the range nerf, when it's really not as bad as they think with the other changes.
He's still nothing compared to his former self...
Any nobody wants that back at all, that was just broke
you never saw him in competitive anyway with his %90 + ban rate. These changes just make it harder for bronzys (me included) to free elo if they get even one kill

It wasn't even broken. His damage was back on-par with other assassins at the time, his mobility was good, but only if you had the mana to sustain it. His early game was pissweak, and if he got behind he became useless. Nerfs were pretty dumb. He won't see competitive play in his current state.

Range nerfs may not seem like much, but for squishy assassins who absolutely *have* to be in the perfect position at the perfect moment in order to succeed, those nerfs are crippling. Also those 1s silences? Godlike for an assassin.

Even a half second silence makes it a fair right, because assassins are so squishy that they die very quickly indeed.

Nerf after nerf after nerf has hit assassins, Riot seems to be moving them out of the game. Which is fine, but don't pretend that the nerfs have improved life for assassins. The only people who think that play AD's.
THE new update to his ultimate isn't bad he clears more distance than his old ult because of the 2 seconds time

The nerf wasn't a that bad on him. My main mid is kass and I know it hasnt screwed him. Its just needed for early game domination. late game hasn't changed for him at all. It was pretty needed considering the snowballing early 6. His mobility and damage together was harsh for other lanes when he ganked/roam. Yes I will admit it does suck but hes still got what it takes to keep his character as a awesome champ. If you understand kass then he will never truly die as a champ!

http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/diamond/by-winrate
over 18 million games and its level 30 ranked only and all diamond+ games only | kassadin has the 2nd lowest win rate of any champion in the game (NA) and the worst globally , riot are retarded , if kass's ult was a problem so is nidalee's w not only is it free its a fucking 2 second cool-down and has same range when u hit q or someone steps on traps , riot don't know how 2 balance , and they keep creating champions (its a problem), and champions that had a decent win-rate and where the base champ for that role(trist, she used to have a high pick rate and 50% win-rate and was middle of the pack. now one of the bottom 3 adc) got destroyed by reworks that showed riot have no understanding of how champions work
there not inhumane
well said friend of golems

I think I may be the only person who liked the old kassadin's animations more where it looked like he wasn't straining himself at all. This dude looks like hes trying real hard to hurt someone.
OMG SO AWESOME! RITO U ACTUALLY REWORKED MY FAV CHAMP!
riot can i get a $25 and it wont work put code in help me

What I hate is how they keep nerfing Kassadin when he was already so hard to carry a game with. You get ahead, then to carry, you need to roam like mad, get the rest of your team fed, and then you can win. With champs like Katarina, you get ahead... then just win without your team, because Katarina is like that... She can 100-0 an entire team in a matter of seconds, but no, Kassadin is the one who urgently needs a rebalance Riot, by all means, go ahead. Keep it up.

R (future)= (removed)

I like {{champion:38}}, when this game started a long time ago, he used to be my one of my favorites, although the Q has always been so strong and the ultimate was just too easy to escape or pick up kills. 

Now, {{champion:38}} with this update, he did loose a lot of power, not only his skills ratio got nerfed / no more silence / no more bullshit jump, so yeah. 

You guys always look only at the strong points on one champion then you apply a strong nerf, but some champions only have 1 strong point and if you take that away, then you left with nothing.
love it riot, fits the theme of the game far better and the attack animation is great
Good Good Not Bad But Good{{champion:38}}
wow
Not bad, but no that good either.

I like what riot is doing their making league the game it should be, a large pool of strong champions to choose from not, choosing from the strongest champions known to be broken but their making it better to actually choose a champ from the entire pool of champions, choosing on abilities not, sats which get too "OP" to quickly or avoiding champs with "Weaker Stats"
looking forward to using this champ......good job guys! :)

While it is true that lowering the cooldown and the range of riftwalk leaves him with a similar amount of mobility he just cannot sustain it. When it's range and cooldown were longer he used it less for more distance. I really think he needs a larger buff.
